author: Marvel Entertainment
description:
What do you get when you combine loads of bits and pieces, some wool, string lights and all the characters from the MCU? 
 
 We’ve challenged Scarlet to use her superpower and build the most awesome way to display the LEGO® Marvel Brickverse on shelves!
 
 Which shelf display is your favorite?

title: The World’s FIRST EVER SHELFVERSE | LEGO Marvel Brickverse CHALLENGE
